title: Survey on regretting tattoos in the U.S. 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 77.0 is found at Response No and the minimum is found at Yes where Response is 23.0.
The highest Response No has 54.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Yes.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response No and lowest at Response Yes.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 77.0 is found at Response No and the minimum is found at Yes where Response is 23.0.
The highest Response No has 54.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Yes.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response No and lowest at Response Yes.
The maximum Response No has got 3.35 times higher Share of respondents than the minimum Response Yes.
The Response Yes has 1.54 times less Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
